description._content: Description: Front Verandah showing view to the Valley below. Location: Seychelles Date: 1900-1929 Description: Front Verandah 131 ft. long, 15 ft. broad in centre & 12 ft. remainder of length. The balustrade is of worked coral. Location: Seychelles Date: 1900-1929 Our Catalogue Reference: Part of CO 1069/771 This image is part of the Colonial Office photographic collection held at The National Archives. Feel free to share it within the spirit of the Commons Please use the comments section below the pictures to share any information you have about the people, places or events shown. We have attempted to provide place information for the images automatically but our software may not have found the correct location. For high quality reproductions of any item from our collection please contact our image library
